presentresults: Helpers to present results into table or graphs

presentresults-package.Rd

The package provides wrappers to turn results from a long format into wide or graphics. For results in a long format, it will work with an analysis key which have the following format analysis_type @/@ dependent_variable

See also

Useful links:
